targets.query: select top_controller_kind as "kind", top_controller_name as "controller" from (select * from alameda_cluster_status..pod where top_controller_kind = 'STATEFULSET' and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' limit 1), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..pod where top_controller_kind = 'DEPLOYMENT' and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' limit 1), (select * from alameda_cluster_status..pod where top_controller_kind = 'DEPLOYMENTCONFIG' and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA' and alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' limit 1) group by alameda_scaler_name, namespace

panels.title: Managed Controllers with HPA ScalingTool per Selected Application

targets.query: select desired_replicas as "desired replicas" from alameda_recommendation..controller where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' order by time desc limit 1
select current_replicas as "current replicas" from alameda_recommendation..controller where namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' order by time desc limit 1

targets.expr: 1000 * sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod) * sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod))
targets.query:
select current_cpu_limits from alameda_recommendation..controller where namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' order by time desc limit 1

sum(label_replace(
sum(avg_over_time(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_cpu_cores{container!="",container!="POD",node="$node"}[10m])) by (pod), 
"pod_name","$1","pod","(.+)")
or up * 0
) by (pod_name)

targets.expr: 1000 * sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores{namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod) * sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod))

sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits_memory_bytes{namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod) * sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod))
targets.query: select current_mem_limits from alameda_recommendation..controller where namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' order by time desc limit 1

targets.expr: sum(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes{namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod) * sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Running", namespace="$ns", pod=~"$pod"}) by (namespace, pod))
targets.query: select current_mem_requests from alameda_recommendation..controller where namespace = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' order by time desc limit 1
select current_cpu_limits from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select current_cpu_requests  from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select desired_cpu_limits from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select desired_replicas from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select current_replicas from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select max(value) from alameda_metric..controller_cpu where "namespace" = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' and $timeFilter and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' group by time(30s)

panels.title: Resource Object CPU Usage(milicore) vs Replica Recommendation

targets.query: select current_mem_limits from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select current_mem_requests from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select round(desired_mem_limits) from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select current_replicas from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select desired_replicas from "alameda_recommendation".."controller" where type = 'PRIMITIVE' and "name" = '$controller' and "namespace" = '$ns'  AND $timeFilter
select max(value) from alameda_metric..controller_memory where "namespace" = '$ns' and "name" = '$controller' and $timeFilter and time <= now() and 'true' = '$preloader' group by time(30s)

panels.title: Resource Object Memory vs Replica Recommendation

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "namespace" where  alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA'
list.label: Namespace
list.name: ns
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "namespace" where  alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "alameda_scaler_name" where  namespace = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA'
list.label: Application
list.name: scaler
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key = "alameda_scaler_name" where  namespace = '$ns' and alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from controller with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler'
list.label: Controller
list.name: controller
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from controller with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler'

list.definition: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "top_controller_name" = '$controller'
list.label: pod
list.name: pod
list.query: show tag values on alameda_cluster_status from pod with key="name" where "namespace" = '$ns' and "alameda_scaler_name" = '$scaler' and "top_controller_name" = '$controller'

list.definition: select preloader from alameda_metric..grafana_config order by time desc limit 1
list.label: Preloader
list.name: preloader
list.query: select preloader from alameda_metric..grafana_config order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1
list.name: controller_ns
list.query: select namespace, "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..pod where alameda_scaler_scaling_tool = 'HPA' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = '$preloader' or '' = '$preloader') group by "namespace" order by time desc limit 1

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "name" = '$controller' and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENT'
list.name: deployment_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "name" = '$controller' and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENT'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "name" = '$controller' and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENTCONFIG'
list.name: deploymentConfig_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "name" = '$controller' and "kind" = 'DEPLOYMENTCONFIG'

list.definition: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "name" = '$controller' and "kind" = 'STATEFULSET'
list.name: statefulset_controller
list.query: select "name", "policy" from alameda_cluster_status..controller where alameda_scaler_name = '$scaler' and namespace = '$ns' and ('false' = "$preloader" or '' = "$preloader") and "name" = '$controller' and "kind" = 'STATEFULSET'
